contentfulPagePressRelease.title: Sidra Appoints Minister Of Public Health As Member Of The Board Of Governors

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Sidra Medical and Research Center (Sidra) today announced the appointment of Her Excellency Dr. Hanan Mohamed Al Kuwari, the Minister of Public Health for the State of Qatar, as a member of its Board of Governors.

Her Excellency Dr. Hanan Mohamed Al Kuwari was appointed as the Minister of Public Health for the State of Qatar in 2016.She is also the Managing Director of Hamad Medical Corporation (HMC), the main national provider of hospital care in Qatar. In her capacity as the Managing Director of HMC, H.E. Dr. Hanan Mohamed Al Kuwari has been credited with transforming the organization into an integrated academic health system that has achieved numerous awards and international accreditations.

H.E. Dr. Hanan Mohamed Al Kuwari is a visiting professor at Imperial College London and is an accomplished speaker and thought leader in the healthcare industry in the region. In addition to being a board member at Sidra, she holds several other board memberships in Qatar, including with the Joint Commission International; Middle East Advisory Council; the Association of Academic Health Centers International Steering Committee and the Institute of Global Health Innovation. She is also the Chairperson of the board for Qatar Biobank.

 For the full story, please click here.
